name: places/ChIJ9XdhiftYwokReo8zyzirxvw
formattedAddress: 521 Park Ave C, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 521 Park Ave C, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
It's hard to put into words what working with Dr. Hanna has done for my life.

In many ways, he restored my faith in surgeons after previous experiences where I left feeling uncared for. His approach to my challenging and unique case was truly special. He is the definition of approachable and caring. He doesn't mind explaining complex medical concepts to you (or your entire family) as many times as needed. He is always just a text or phone call away during the healing process and I never felt like a burden when I had concerns.

Besides Dr. Hanna's character, his talent is extraordinary. Take a look at his before and after photos -- they speak for themselves. He was able to create results that I couldn't even bring myself to imagine. I feel healthier and look better than I have in years.

He has an incredible team behind him, in office and in the operating room. I've only had positive experiences with every member of his staff and Mount Sinai resident.

Dr. Hanna is someone who I have the utmost respect for as a provider and a human being. After 2 years of working together, I really consider him a friend. I can not recommend him enough.

originalText.text:
Dr Hanna is IMO one of the finest facial surgeons. Years ago after a face changing bout of Bells Palsy I had a renowned plastic surgeon, Dr Daniel Baker take on the Herculean task of realigning my face. In addition to a nerve transversal and slight lift on that one side he deployed a chin implant. Fast forward two decades and the implant had migrated.
Dr Hanna had been recommended and I went for a consult. His staff is terrific but he is amazing! With state of the art technology Dr Hanna proceeded to explain what he would now do…remove the now migrated implant and replace it with a custom made permanent chin implant.
His approach is thoughtful, studied and erudite and my result it amazing!
I can’t say enough wonderful things about his work and his kind, professional manner!

originalText.text:
Dr. Hanna is a world-class surgeon. But unlike many who share the title of “surgeon”, Dr. Hanna is foremost a human being who displays empathy throughout the course of treatment.

The doctor’s specialized skill and training are all well documented. What you really want to know in reading this is whether you’ll be treated fairly. Take notice: you won’t regret seeking treatment through his practice. Surgeries of this gravity can be a harrowing thought, but Dr. Hanna’s practice will do everything they can to put the right treatment in your grasp.

originalText.text: Thanks to my dentist’s recommendation, I was so fortunate to find Dr. Hanna to once and for all deal with a 3-time recurring OKC (a rare and benign, but locally aggressive cyst) in my upper jaw/sinus area. He is truly my medical superman - super skilled, super nice, and super calming.  I completely trusted him from the moment I met him.   OK, yes, I googled him first and was so impressed with his training and background.  His kind and warm demeanor was an added surprise.  An excellent surgeon, I healed quickly after a complex ambulatory surgery.  I can confidently say that I do not expect another recurrence of this OKC.  His office team is top notch as well!  I would not hesitate for a second to recommend Dr. Hanna to my family/friends to perform any medical, dental, or cosmetic procedure in his capacity.  He is simply the best.

originalText.text: Dr Hanna is a truly skilled surgeon and an even better human being. His attention to detail and full commitment to his patients is second to none.
